thread.title: Seadrill Reshuffles Bankruptcy Workout Plan to Build Support

author: Peg Brickley
title: Seadrill Reshuffles Bankruptcy Workout Plan to Build Support
text:
Seadrill Ltd., the offshore energy company run by Norwegian billionaire John Fredriksen, quelled opposition to its bankruptcy exit plan by making room for more creditors to invest in getting the company back on its feet.
Weeks of talks headed off a threatened open-court battle over Seadrillâ€™s attempt to reshuffle its debts and bring in new money.
